Welcome to the Webel IT Australia test web app template for PrimeFaces.

All of these help boxes and help panels can be removed from this home index.html page by simply commenting out or deleting all the <ui:include ...> items for them. After you've read them (or if you've already read the entire online README) you may also delete the entire /web/help folder from your copied then adapted project.

Your final home page will only show the diagnostic header, a page title, an "About" panel, and a fieldset with links to one or more test case pages.
